attributes.action: Make free bath plugs available to all hard-working British families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition does not call for the distribution of expensive bath plugs. A bath plug costing only 88p would suffice; I feel sure that a government department could be set up to obtain a bulk-buy price for even less. In the interests of fairness, everyone should be entitled to a free bath plug.
